message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CV 

The paper proposes a method to improve the memory capacity of recurrent neural networks for remembering long sequences. This involves learning the memory update rule jointly with the task objective, which falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of associative memory, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the proposed architecture involves encoding complex inputs, which is relevant to computer vision (cs.CV).
